results.title: Impeachment
results.brief_description: “Summary: traces the history of impeachment from the Magna Carta through the American Revolution, the drafting of the U.S. constitution, the impeachment of Andrew Johnson and the issues involving Richard Nixon. explains the process of impeachment of a president and examines the roles of the House of Representatives and the Senate”

results.title: Contraception
results.brief_description: SUMMARY: Points out the needs for contraceptives during intercourse. Shows the various kinds of contraceptives used today, covering the history of their development, physical properties, the contraceptive principle behind them and uses live photography to show how they work. Discusses the advantages, disadvantages and comparative effectiveness of each method.

results.title: Charles Darwin
results.brief_description: “Summary: presents the discoveries, method of study, theories and personal philosophy of charles darwin. describes his observations on the galapagos finches which later figured in his conclusions on organic evolution. features professor richard eakin of the university of california in the role of the scientist”
